passive1.name: Tribute
passive1.effects: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. Damaging abilities and attacks against champions and buildings consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 15. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

passive2.name: Quest
passive2.effects: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Black Mist Scythe, increasing the Warding active to instead have 4 wards in stock.

active.name: Warding
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location (600 range), which reveals the surrounding area. Holds up to 3 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

other.limit: Limited to 1 Jungle or Gold Income item. A player may only have 3  Stealth Wards or  Totem Wards on the map at one time.
